channel.title: Comments on: Computational Thinking and Spreadsheets, Teacher Edition (#TeachersCoding)
channel.description: iteration, making, building, and coding in education

item.title: By: xiousgeonz
item.dc:creator: xiousgeonz
item.description: I think the "onboarding" thing is huge: something easy to understand and do that is actually useful. Then, even if it stops there, they've got something useful, and they might just do it more than once, which would make it more likely to try to extend a little further...
item.content:encoded: I think the “onboarding” thing is huge: something easy to understand and do that is actually useful. Then, even if it stops there, they’ve got something useful, and they might just do it more than once, which would make it more likely to try to extend a little further…
